short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See more data about your surf sessions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You have got the great Rip Curl Search GPS watch and enjoy analyzing your surf sessions : “Unleash Your Surf Watch” is made for you !

Log in to searchgps.ripcurl.com as you usually do and click on the small watch icon to see more data !

“Unleash Your Surf Watch” features are :
* Interactive map : select a wave on the map and see its measurements.
* Detailed measurements : For each wave catched, view distance, duration and max speed. You can also view the evolution of speed and distance during time.
* Comparison : Compare two surfs and, if the spot is the same, see all waves catched on the same map. Start competing with your friends !

Unleash Your Surf Watch (UYSW) is not affiliated with Rip Curl Ltd in any way and is not considered a substitute of searchgps.ripcurl.com website. You must be logged in searchgps.ripcurl.com website to use UYSW which provides to you a complementary view of your surfs. Please note that surf data are hosted by Rip Curl services and are not transmitted to UYSW.

Keep your web browser up to date and everything should be fine. Enjoy !
